code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AddPage(_ref){let{handleAddFriend}=_ref;console.log("hello baby");const[friendName,setFriendName]=useState("");const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();handleAddFriend(friendName);setFriendName("");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"add-page container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Add a Friend"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:friendName,onChange:e=>setFriendName(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter friend's name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Friend"})]})]});}export default AddPage;
